businesses.name: Toscanini's Ice Cream
businesses.snippet_text:

The khulfee (cardamom nut) is some of the best ice cream I've ever had,...

businesses.snippet_text:

I got the green tea flavor and it was exactly what I wanted! I will definitely come back here...
